## \_filter() function

Filter an array of items, only returning the ones who pass the specified expression

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _filter<T>(originals: Maybe<ImmutableArray<T>>, expression: (value: Immutable<T>, index?: number, Array?: unknown[]) => boolean): Immutable<T>[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  originals | Maybe&lt;ImmutableArray&lt;T&gt;&gt; | An array of items to be filtered |
|  expression | (value: Immutable&lt;T&gt;, index?: number, Array?: unknown\[\]) =&gt; boolean | An expression for filtering the items |

<b>Returns:</b>

Immutable&lt;T&gt;\[\]

An array of items that passed the expression
